meanings.definition: To make or convert into a robot.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys robotizing old toys to make them move on their own.
meanings.sent2: The factory started robotizing its assembly line to increase efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The mad scientist was robotizing everything in his lab, even the coffee machine!
meanings.sent4: The futuristic company is robotizing the workforce, replacing humans with machines.
meanings.sent5: After robotizing the vacuum cleaner, it now cleans the house automatically.

meanings.definition: To automate or mechanize a process.
meanings.sent1: The company is robotizing their customer service with chatbots.
meanings.sent2: Farmers are robotizing agriculture by using drones for crop monitoring.
meanings.sent3: The kitchen appliances were robotizing the cooking process, making dinner a breeze.
meanings.sent4: The new software is robotizing data entry, saving time for employees.
meanings.sent5: By robotizing the packaging process, the company reduced errors and increased speed.

meanings.definition: The act of transforming into a robot.
meanings.sent1: The robotizing of the character in the movie was impressive.
meanings.sent2: His robotizing during the play amazed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The sudden robotizing of the toy startled the child.
meanings.sent4: The robotizing of the costume made the actor look like a real robot.
meanings.sent5: The robotizing of the robot in the show was so realistic.
